lil flip: the block too hot these niggas aint playin in fact they die over greed while i smoke weed with red here yall niggas know i flip them bizzirds yall niggas know i sip that sizzurp i comin from houston the home of face boy im a bad boy like puffy and mase boy the bigger the pistol the bigger the bullet bitch dont play with me cause im eager to pull it trick what you about that purple haze i smoke that shit thatll make you miss work for days i got bricks of coke and pounds of dro and i dont discuss business around them hoes oh no i aint tryin to be that nigga gettin cuffed up rule number one dont ever talk much rule number two keep them niggas out ya crib cause you just cant show everybody where you live niggas think i changed cause i got a little change but the money and the fame came along with the game now you wonder why we get high just to get by motherfucker
